title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C programming is a versatile and widely-used programming language known for its efficiency and flexibility. It is essential for system-level programming.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Before there were computers, there were algorithms. But now that there are computers, there are even more algorithms, and algorithms lie at the heart of computing.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) is a versatile programming language used extensively in competitive programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic data structures are fundamental building blocks in computer science and programming, including arrays, linked lists, and stacks.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python is a paradigm that focuses on organizing code into reusable and modular objects.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software engineering is the systematic and disciplined approach to designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a leading cloud computing platform that offers a wide range of scalable and on-demand cloud services.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system known for its speed, reliability, and ease of use.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-solving is the process of finding effective solutions to complex issues or challenges. It involves identify the problem and analyzing it.
